text: Fred Heismann is an electrical engineer at JDS Uniphase Corp. in Colts Neck, New Jersey. He was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for his contributions to understanding, control of, and mitigation of polarization effects in fiberoptic communication systems. ==References== Category:20th-century births Category:Living people Category:American electrical engineers Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Fred Heismann
